attributes.action: UK military participation with EU must come with a free trade agreement.
attributes.additional_details: Providing additional military support will be costly , to enable our economy to carry this additional burden requires economic growth which can be helped by a free trade agreement.
attributes.background: Make a full free trade agreement a precondition to any military aid or military participation with the EU or individual European countries.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. 

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. There is already a free trade agreement in place between the EU and UK, you can find out more here: https://www.gov.uk/government/publications/ukeu-and-eaec-trade-and-cooperation-agreement-ts-no82021

We are also not sure about what type of military participation you are referring to.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
